Hobies?

This part can be edited at index.html

Very quick notes:

  • There are 6 heading tags h1-h6
  • To mane anything center aligned, use center tag
  • This particular theme has 4 wrapper style (wrapper style1-4) that changes bg color or alignment of text. Like style1 is this portion and style 2 is above portion
  • If you have repeting elements, add them to _include folder and use include tags to include them
  • If you want to change the layout, everything is under _layout
  • Using class row helps elements space one after the other
  • Using class row no-collapse-1, spaces elements next to each other
  • You can make any element a button by using a href tag
  • I hope I made things a little easier for you and not made you hate web development :P
